DisplayName: Ministry of Finance, Economic Development and National Planning
Mandate: Set policy, manage budgets, and coordinate multi-sector responses to revenue and security challenges.
TopPriorities: Prioritize expenditures while improving budget transparency.
Coordinate with ZRA and Bank of Zambia on revenue vulnerabilities.
Sustain public-private dialogue on sector reforms.
ActiveOperations: Budget performance committees reviewing monthly revenue-expenditure data.
Macro-financial risk analysis modeling using sector data.
Oversight of transparency initiatives publishing registers online.

RecentActions.Title: Policy announcement on sector transparency
RecentActions.Summary: Required enhanced disclosure and reporting requirements.

RecentActions.Title: Strategic sector review launched
RecentActions.Summary: Published outlook linking forecasts to development programs.

Mandate: Set policy, manage budgets, and coordinate multi-sector responses to revenue and security challenges.
TopPriorities: Prioritize expenditures while improving budget transparency.
Coordinate with ZRA and Bank of Zambia on revenue vulnerabilities.
Sustain public-private dialogue on sector reforms.
ActiveOperations: Budget performance committees reviewing monthly revenue-expenditure data.
Macro-financial risk analysis modeling using sector data.
Oversight of transparency initiatives publishing registers online.
